articles.description: Now surviving only on the ₹30,000 BCCI pension for retired cricketers and struggling to make ends meet in a city like Mumbai, Kambli is ready to ditch his flashy lifestyle to get work in the Mumbai Cricket Association. The left-hander who once reportedly scor…
articles.content: At 21 years and 32 days, Vinod Kambli became the youngest Indan - and third on the list in the world - to score a Test double hundred. It came against England in 1993 at his home ground in Mumbai. Ne… [+2034 chars]

articles.title: ILT20: Moeen mystery continues as GMR, Capri announce squads | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Moeen is part of Sharjah Warriors in ILT20 and the CSK-owned Johannesburg team in CSA's league. The two tournaments will be played simultaneously in January-February 2023
articles.content:
Cricbuzz understands that Moeen has had a conversation with the league organisers and agreed to be part of ILT20 whenever he is not playing for England. © BCCI

articles.title: Rishabh Pant’s Humbleness Backfires In Front Of Fans As He Gets Honest About T20 WC Hopes - msnNOW
articles.description: Indian cricket team got really upset with the 24-year-old wicket-keeper batter Rishabh Pant when he decided to be humble in his aspirations regarding the upcoming T20 World Cup.
